name: Limited-Uplink-Aware IFLB
summary: The feature introduces limited uplink awareness to load balancing and adapts the

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.cellDownlinkCaCapacity
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.estCellCapUsableFraction
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.cellDownlinkCaCapacity
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.estCellCapUsableFraction
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_SUB_RATIO
parameters.description: Average subscription ratio for a cell during a load reporting period. Default                     time is 15 seconds.

parameters.name: X2_PRIVATE_MESSAGE
parameters.type: ASN.1 encoded content is part of the pmEventHeader
parameters.description: X2 messages used to subscribe and exchange load information between RBSs.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: CGI of target cell that participates in load balancing if it is available.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Load difference (in subscription ratio) between source and neighbor cells.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Unsigned integer value of EVENT_PARAM_LB_DIFF . The value                     can be positive or negative.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Load balancing amount (in subscription quanta) to be moved from source to                     target cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Subscription ratio of source cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Subscription ratio of target cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Rate offset applied to offset the load balancing towards a cell with higher                     capacity, if the general traffic load level is low.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Unsigned integer value of EVENT_PARAM_LB_RATE_OFFSET. The                     value can be positive or negative.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Target frequency

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Indicates the function that has triggered UE measurement.  Can be one of the following:    Load Balancing     CATR     Best Neighbor Relation (BNR) for Load Balancing

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the UE selected for load balancing related                     measurements is CA-capable.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: CGI of neighbor target cells for which UEs fulfilled A5 measurement criteria.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Number of UEs checked and discarded before choosing this UE for load balancing                     related measurements.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: CGI of neighbor target cells for which UEs fulfilled A5 measurement criteria.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the RAT of the source for incoming handover and for target for                     outgoing handover cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the reason for not proceeding with a load balancing or CATR when a                     measurement report has been received from the UE:    CA criteria not met     Reported cell is not a valid load balancing target     Reported cell is a valid target, but lbAmount is already satisfied for the                         cell     Service Specific Load Management (SSLM) related restrictions     RSRQ of target cell is lower than configured threshold     UE has signalled interest in Multimedia Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS)                         on serving frequency     UE has an ongoing Voice over IP (VoIP) call and does not support Single                         Radio Voice Call Continuity (SRVCC)

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the function that has triggered the UE measurement.   Can be one of the following:    Load balancing     CATR     BNR for load balancing

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_X2_OUT
parameters.description: Cause added indicating mobility due to load balancing.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Cause added indicating mobility due to load balancing.

parameters.name: Uen.AM
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.pmLbQualifiedUe
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.pmHoPrepAttLteInterFLb
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.pmHoPrepSuccLteInterFLb
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.pmHoExeAttLteInterFLb
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011966 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011966 MO instance.
